ValidationRule.description:
NICC-053541
DISABLED BY STUART EMERY ON 09/27/2021 BECAUSE IT IS CAUSING ISSUES FOR CBS PROJECTS
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordTypeId = "0120d000000JOpsAAG", This_Project_Will_Increase_Revenue__c = True, NOT(ISBLANK(Estimated_Annual_Revenue_Increase__c )), NOT(ISBLANK(Annual_Revenue_Increase_Confidence__c))), ISBLANK( RIC_How_did_you_arrive_at_this_number__c ))
